message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $120. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $145.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $145 is still a bit too high for me.  How about we split the difference at $132.50?  This would be a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. I can offer it to you for $137.50.
